side and we did we did all the right JavaScript things like we're using backbone we're doing all these like right things but we wrote this

architecture we have here is that in bokeh in the python interface when you create these like compositional graphs
of things you actually end up with an object graph and that object graph is pure python it actually doesn't so bokeh
doesn't actually have a hard dependency on numpy pandas or even python 2 it works with Python 3 it works with pi pie okay because all you're building is an
object graph and that object graph gets turned into Json which is sent over the browser and the JavaScript The BJs
runtime in the browser it looks at the Json and reconstitutes the scene graph a reactive um interactive scene graph
representing the plot run rendering a canvas if you run the bokeh server if you run bokeh in server mode then
actually we use websockets and we communicate back and forth and essentially what you have is actually
